_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Websockify
author: regulad@outlook.com
description: Rapidly deploy a testing instance of https://github.com/novnc/websockify through pterodactyl.

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# Websockigy installation script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
PROJECT=websockify
cd /mnt/server
curl -SL https://github.com/novnc/websockify/archive/refs/tags/v$WEBSOCKIFY_VERSION.tar.gz \
| tar xzC .
